pages.title: Bottle Of Somnium
pages.text: A bottle of Somnium is required to run alchemy at all. It is a base Potion alongside Loran Energy. A bottle of Somnium is also very good for your health and your energy! It is namely the bridge between two worlds, an energy stronger than mana.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: This essence can be crafted in a Crafting Table.
